predictions.article: Secretary Rollins Delivers Remarks at Commodity Classic
predictions.prediction: The distribution of $30 billion in economic and disaster relief funds through the Emergency Commodity Assistance Program (ECAP) will lead to a measurable increase in farm income levels for row crop producers within the next quarter.
